name: Golden Treasure: The Great Green Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The Sun is your Father. The Earth is your Mother. All Beings are your Prey.

The Art and Writing found in the Great Green dance to the Music of the Green.

Golden Treasure: The Great Green Soundtrack is composed by Jim Gabriel featuring additional content from Dylan Packard.

Track List

1. Closest Night
2. Retrospection II
3. South Bend, Indiana 1989
4. Dayspring
5. Distant Memories
6. Lost chances
7. Spring Reverie
8. Sojourn
9. Winter
10. Chaccone
11. Into Eternity
12. From the Rising of the Sun
13. Goodbye for Now
14. Dreams of You
15. To the Sky
16. Contemplation
17. Echoes of the Past
18. Moving Forward
19. Golden Treasure Atmospheres 1
20. Golden Treasure Atmospheres 2
21. Golden Treasure Atmospheres 3

short_description: Experience the Music of the Green. Golden Treasure is a game for those who carry dragons in their hearts. Hunt, explore, survive, and become Great among the True Children of Sun and Earth.
